LanguageData.EVOR_Resource_Protein.label: protein slag
LanguageData.EVOR_Resource_Protein.description: A vial of animal proteins ready to be synthesized with mechanites and formed into a specialized appendage or organ.
LanguageData.EVOR_Resource_Mechanites.label: nano mechanites
LanguageData.EVOR_Resource_Mechanites.description: A vial of nanomachines ready to be used to modify a mass of cells into a large, complex organ.
